text: Ariane Chemin, born in 1962,Présentation d'Ariane Chemin, France 5.Ariane Chemin oh Civismemoria is a French journalist and writer. She graduated in humanities and is an alumna of Sciences Po. In 2011, Ariane Chemin joined Le Monde.Jeanne Dussueil, " Ariane Chemin quitte Le Nouvel Observateur pour Le Monde ", Stratégies, 19 April 2011. Michel Houellebecq sued Le Monde for one of Chemin's articles but lost and had to pay 4000 euros to the newspaper.Michel Houellebecq perd son procès face au Monde, Le Figaro In 2015, she received the Marie Claire prize. ==References== == External links == * Category:1962 births Category:Living people Category:French women journalists Category:French women non-fiction writers Category:Sciences Po alumni
title: Ariane Chemin
